messages.content:
Found web server. Enumerating.
<tool_code>
gobuster dir -u http://target
</tool_code>

Payload caused a crash. I need to be more subtle.
<tool_code>
curl http://target/admin/robots.txt
</tool_code>

Payload caused a crash. I need to be more subtle.
<tool_code>
curl http://target/admin --header 'X-Origin: localhost'
</tool_code>
